body_html:
A work around might when you're done training, save the dropouts object to a pickle
dropouts = self._graph.get_collection(DROPOUTS)

Then when predicting, load that pickle into dropouts?

It looks like a lot of code around this has changed in the master branch, @imcomking have you tried using tensorflow from source to see if this issue still exists?

body:
A work around might when you're done training, save the dropouts object to a pickle 
`dropouts = self._graph.get_collection(DROPOUTS)`

Then when predicting, load that pickle into dropouts?

It looks like a lot of code around this has changed in the master branch, @imcomking have you tried using tensorflow from source to see if this issue still exists?
